name: Grass Mud Horse
description:
Grass Mud Horse is a PS2 inspired first-person video game about what it's like to work on a film set.   

This is the second strand game ever made.

You play as a cinematographer for famous film auteur Bobby Wu who's tasked you with setting up lights, smoking cigarettes, and filming some sweet kissing!

A game by Toby Do, Emi Schaufeld, and Julia Wang

Music:

You're Happy So I'm Happy by Faye Wong

Exotic Dance by Roy Ayers

Made at NYU for Game Studio 1

Special thanks to Robert Yang and Matt Boch!!
